revised_title: Investigating the Similarities in Average Characteristics of World Wide Magnetic Disturbance
tldr: This article examines the average characteristics of worldwide magnetic disturbances, comparing minor and intense disturbances. The author finds that the average additional magnetic variations during magnetic disturbances do not differ much in type as the intensity varies. The study focuses on the local-time diurnal variations and storm-time changes, concluding that the average characteristics of slight and intense disturbances are similar in type.
